ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(NOT(Contains(RecordType.Name, 'Master Campaign')), RecordType.Name != 'Commercial' , RecordType.Name != "Dummy Campaign", OR( RTL_Call_Start_Date__c < StartDate , RTL_Call_Start_Date__c > EndDate
) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The call start date cannot be earlier than the campaign start date.
